Pre-Game Insights: The Nuggets have gone 9-5 in home games and 6-4 when they have fewer turnovers than their opponents.
The Hawks have gone 8-8 away from home and 9-9 in games decided by 10 points or more.
The Nuggets make 50.1% of their shots from the field, which is 3.0 percentage points higher than the Hawks have allowed to their opponents (47.1%).
The Hawks average 117.8 points per game, 0.3 more than the 117.5 the Nuggets give up.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Nuggets: 7-3, averaging 126.5 points, 45.9 rebounds, 33.4 assists, 8.9 steals and 4.0 blocks per game while shooting 53.2% from the field.
Hawks: 6-4, averaging 120.7 points, 45.8 rebounds, 30.0 assists, 10.8 steals and 5.3 blocks per game while shooting 47.3% from the field.

Injuries: Nuggets - Aaron Gordon (out), DaRon Holmes II (out for season), Vlatko Cancar (out). Hawks - Bogdan Bogdanovic (day to day), Kobe Bufkin (out for season), Larry Nance Jr. (out), Dyson Daniels (day to day), Cody Zeller (out).
